description:
Cover your cranium with a ski and cycling approved helmet. The convertible full-wrap liner allows toque layering, and the 360 fit system tunes in comfort. The Magna-Snap goggle clip uses magnets for easy attachment. And a passive ventilation system moves moisture to stop you from overheating when ripping in sunshine.

  • Molded polycarbonate shell offers lightweight performance
  • Expanded polystyrene inner
  • Passive Channel Ventilation System moves air to push moisture and warm air out
  • K2 Dialed Fit system features 360 dial that locks into a web construction for maximum comfort, eliminating pressure points
  • Magna-Snap goggle clip has a magnetic strap for easy lens attachment
  • Convertible full wrap washable liner
  • Crown mesh wicks moisture and breathes to prevent overheating
name: K2 Stash Snow Helmet - Unisex
